refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Some documents, usually legacy documents, use headings that are not tied to the normal sectional hierarchy. These headings may be represented in DocBook with the bridgehead element.
A bridgehead may also be useful in fiction or journalistic works that donâ€™t have a nested hierarchy.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A bridgehead is formatted as a block, using the same display properties as the section heading which it masquerades as. The renderas attribute controls which heading it mimics.
Bridge heads are not numbered, even when they are rendered as headings that are otherwise numbered.
